title: "Computing Technology"

![](images/background.png){fig-alt="A friendly robot army.  They just want to talk to you." width="500"}

> Use the computer well and it will be a great servant.  Use it badly and it will be your master.

**Computing Technology is an introduction to computer science through a range of programming languages, suitable for those with or without prior programming experience.** This module emphasizes problem-solving, focusing on correctness, design, and style. The module demonstrates concepts using various programming languages.
